remarks:
Generalization rule for restricted quantification, with three quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.) 

---

 Generalization rule for restricted quantification.  (Contributed by NM, 12-Jan-2008.)
statement:
rgen3.1 $e |- ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B /\ z e. C ) -> ph ) $.
rgen3 $p |- A. x e. A A. y e. B A. z e. C ph $.
$d A y z $.
$d B z $.
$d x y z $.
